excerpt: Curious about the release date and time of The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6? Find out all the relevant information about it here.

text: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 release date and time are not too far away, and viewers are curious to learn the details. This episode is titled “The Price.” In the previous episode, “Feel Her Love,” the WLF found something dangerous. Meanwhile, Ellie debated over going through with her plan to exact revenge on Abby and her friends, which could risk Dina’s life. Here’s all you need to know. When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 18, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT) Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 18, 202509:00 p.m.Pacific TimeMay 18, 202506:00 p.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here. Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 via HBO and HBO Max. HBO is a pay television service, while Max is a subscription-based OTT platform. The streaming platform offers subscribers a wide variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages. The content offered includes both original movies/TV shows and licensed projects. What is The Last of Us about? The Last of Us Season 2 adapts the events of the video game The Last of Us Part II. The story follows Ellie on a perilous and brutal quest for vengeance after Joel’s shocking and heartbreaking demise at the hands of Abby. The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows: “Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
html:
The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 release date and time are not too far away, and viewers are curious to learn the details. This episode is titled “The Price.” In the previous episode, “Feel Her Love,” the WLF found something dangerous. Meanwhile, Ellie debated over going through with her plan to exact revenge on Abby and her friends, which could risk Dina’s life.

Here’s all you need to know.

When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 18, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT)

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here.

Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6

You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 6 via HBO and HBO Max.

HBO is a pay television service, while Max is a subscription-based OTT platform. The streaming platform offers subscribers a wide variety of film and television content, spanning genres and languages. The content offered includes both original movies/TV shows and licensed projects.

What is The Last of Us about?

The Last of Us Season 2 adapts the events of the video game The Last of Us Part II. The story follows Ellie on a perilous and brutal quest for vengeance after Joel’s shocking and heartbreaking demise at the hands of Abby.

The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows:

“Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
